short_summary: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a high speed and high precision 3-axis CNC Milling Machine for the Design and Fabrication Service (DFS) Branch in Ottawa, ON.
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) Design and Fabrication Service (DFS) Branch has a requirement for high speed and high precision 3 axis CNC Milling Machine with delivery to Ottawa, ON on or before October 31, 2023. Interested suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
<CENTER>Government Tender Notice for One CNC Milling Machine </CENTER>

**Title (English/French)**
PR4531 31184-238610 CNC Milling Machine / PR4531 31184-238610 Fraiseuse CNC

**Reference Number (French)**
WS3835438924-Doc3908758745

**Amendment Number/Modification #**
4

**Solicitation Number/Sollicitation #**
WS3835438924

**Publication Date (English/French)**
2023-03-09 / 09 mars 2023

**Tender Closing Date/Appel Offres Date Clôture**
2023-04-14T 14:00:00

**Additional Information**

This tender notice is for one high speed and high precision 3-axis CNC milling machine. For more information, including technical specifications, please refer to the [government webpage](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15649840?extsite=MTU2NDk4NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Background**
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is in need of a 3-axis CNC milling machine with high speed and precision capabilities.

**Contract Details**
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-24
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-10-31
* Regions of Delivery: Ottawa, ON
* Procurement Category: *GD*
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and 11 others.

**Eligibility**
All interested suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Statement of Requirement.

**Submission**
Please submit your bid by 14:00 EDT on April 14, 2023. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Contact Information**
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Andreas Psarras2 at (SPAC/PSPC) andreas.psarras2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

*CNC Milling Machine Specifications (Technical Specifications list available in full tender notice)*

* Parts/Accessories required
* Operational requirements

**Publications Related to this Solicitation**
* Full tender notice and attachments at [government webpage](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/156
